channel.title: Database on xiaoni's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Database on xiaoni's blog

item.title: Bioinformatics analysis of prognostic value of PITX1 gene in breast cancer
Comprehensive Bioinformatics Analysis of Tumor-Infiltrating Immune Cells
item.description:
Recent clinical successes of cancer immunotherapy necessitate the investigation of the interaction between malignant cells and the host immune system.

Herein, I summarized five bioinformatics tools for comprehensive analysis of tumor-infiltrating immune cells.

item.title: Identification of Therapeutic Targets and Prognostic Biomarkers Among CXC Chemokines in the Renal Cell Carcinoma Microenvironment
item.description:
In this study, the authors conducted an in-depth and comprehensive bioinformatics analysis of the expression of CXC chemokines in Renal cell carcinoma and evaluated their potential as therapeutic targets and prognostic biomarkers based on several large public databases.

I will recover all figures for this paper step by step.

item.title: UCSC Xena Features: Genomic Signatures
item.description: Genomic signatures, sometimes expressed as a weighted sum of genes, are an algebra over genes.

item.title: UCSC Xena: Private and Public Data Put Together
item.description: Put private data and public Xena Data together via UCSC Xena Hub .

item.title: Local UCSC Xena Data Hub
item.description: Load the private data to Local Xena Data Hub.

item.title: UCSC Xena: Load Data From Public Database
item.description: Load and analysis data from publication resources, such as GEO.

item.title: TissGDB: tissue-specific gene database in cancer
item.description: TissGDB is the tissue-specific gene annotation database in cancer, aiming to provide a resource or reference for cancer and the related disease studies in the context of tissue specificity.
